issue.title: X2 robot gets stuck on lip between urban service room and urban_straight_door_right

content.raw: Technically the maximum velocity for the X2 is supposed to be around 1.8m/s if we are to carry over limits from the G9 competition so it's not a huge surprise to hear of a flip at 2.0m/s but it would be good to have that limited on the Ignition side.
content.html: Technically the maximum velocity for the X2 is supposed to be around 1.8m/s if we are to carry over limits from the G9 competition so it's not a huge surprise to hear of a flip at 2.0m/s but it would be good to have that limited on the Ignition side.
